question.body: Bones affected by osteoporosis lose bone mass and mineral content. Which of the following could result in the same loss of bone mass and mineral content?

multiple_choice.choice: Overactive osteoblasts resulting in excess resorption
Overactive osteoclasts resulting in excess resorption
Overactive osteoclasts resulting in excess deposition.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Osteoblasts are involved in deposition not resorption.
Incorrect. Osteoclasts are involved in resoption, not deposition
